description: Every upscaled results in just a black screen. Tried color and black and white images. Every image comes out solid black.

It upscale anime and cartoonish type art with well defined edges quite good.
Images with poor edges or where colors seems to just blend with other surfaces too well, it just makes it worse. Also when you upscale human subjects, the eyes seems a bit too... glossy.

Overall this app is nice. I hope it'll improve more in future.
summary: Good App. It mostly does things well
Great app. It's just a frontend to a Vulkan implementation of ESGRAN
